title: How to Make Stodge Cakes

steps.headline: Rub the lard and flour together until it looks like large bread crumbs.
Add the salt, water and egg.
Stir the ingredients for about 5 minutes until thick and doughy.
Make the doughy mixture into balls about the size of meatballs.
Pre-heat your oven at Gas Mark 4.
Put the baking tray in the oven.
Cook until risen and golden brown, with just a tinge of black in the dead centre of the top.
Good things to serve stodge cakes with are:
steps.description: Cheese Salami and melted cheese Salami Butter Ham Clotted cream Sugar Honey Caramel Spaghetti sauce

text: Rub the lard and flour together until it looks like large bread crumbs.  Add the salt, water and egg.  Stir the ingredients for about 5 minutes until thick and doughy.  Make the doughy mixture into balls about the size of meatballs.  Carefully grease a baking tray.  Pre-heat your oven at Gas Mark 4.  Put the baking tray in the oven.  Cook until risen and golden brown, with just a tinge of black in the dead centre of the top.  Good things to serve stodge cakes with are: Cheese Salami and melted cheese Salami Butter Ham Clotted cream Sugar Honey Caramel Spaghetti sauce
